name: Thomas Cannon
tagline: I'm like a butler for web apps, taking care of the details and making people happy
body:
### Howdy

I work for [slash7](http://slash7.com/), making software people love to use.

You can [read my blog](http://thomascannon.me/) or [follow me on Twitter](http://twitter.com/LockeCole117).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
